p:
Animals were sacrificed, and the brain was removed. The brain samples were rinsed with normal saline and homogenized with 0.1 M phosphate buffer (pH 7.4) in a tissue homogenizer. The buffer was added 10 times (w/v) and centrifuged at 10â€¯000 rpm for 10 min. The supernatant was collected in different aliquots for the biochemical assay.
